TextView.android:text: Request to Transfer the Real Property Ownership
This is to transfer the real property to its new owner.
G2C - Government to Citizen\nG2G - Government to Government
Tax Declarant/Owner, Authorized Representative of the Declarant/Owner & Coordinating Offices
2. Notarized Registered Deed of Conveyance (ROD registered if applicable) (1 original copy)
3. Barangay Treasurer's Office/ Municipal Treasurerâ€™s Office
4. RPT Tax Payment & Tax Clearance of Current Year\n(Situational Requirements)
1. Electronic copy of the Title: (1 original copy)
1. Certified True Copy of the Title (1 original copy)
2. DAR Project Beneficiary Certificate (1 original copy)
1. Accomplishes Request Form and submits the required documents.
1.1. Provides Request Form and evaluates the required documents according to the Checklist of Requirements.
- If the evaluated documents are incomplete, asks for the Checklist of Requirements Form and secures the lacking documents.
1.2. If the submitted documents are lacking, return the submitted documents, advises client to secure the required documents and gives a copy of the Checklist Form. End of Service
- If the required documents are complete, accomplishes the Sworn Statement.
1.3. If the required documents are complete, let the client accomplish the Sworn Statement.
2.4. Checks data entries & photocopy the documents
2.5. Prints the FAAS, Tax Declaration, NOA & Inspection Report
2.6. Verifies & signs the printed and supporting documents
2.7. Uploads of the Geo-package to PASSO Tax Mapping Department via email
2.8. Segregates the assessment documents for transmittal & for office file
3. Records documents in the logbook. Issues the assessment documents to the client.
4. Accomplishes the Client Satisfaction Survey (CSS) form and drops in the feedback drop box.
4.1. Gives CSS form for service feedback. Instructs the client to place the accomplished CSS form in the feedback drop box.
